modal_unsaved_text: You have unsaved changes. Would you like to save them before exiting?
settings_first_launch_hint: This is the first launch! Please check and save your settings.
settings_language_desc: Select the language for displaying texts.
settings_animations_desc: Smooth transitions, button and timer pulsing on hover.
settings_effects_desc: Visual particle effects when marking days and completing a month.
settings_desc_section_dates: The main dates used by the timers and the calendar.
settings_date_departure_desc: The day you parted ways. The calendar will start from the next day.
settings_date_arrival_desc: The day of your next reunion. The end date for the calendar and the "Until We Meet" timer.
settings_date_relationship_desc: The day from which you count the start of your relationship. Used by the "We Are Together" timer.
settings_desc_timers: Manage the display and text of the timers on the main page.
settings_timers_completed_desc: The text displayed when the countdown timer reaches zero.
settings_timers_arrival_text_desc: The title for the main countdown timer.
settings_timers_relationship_text_desc: The title for the main elapsed time timer.
settings_desc_timers_subtitle_custom_des: This list of timers is displayed below the "We Are Together" timer.
settings_desc_section_calendar: Configure the appearance of the calendar grid, marked days, and the arrival day.
settings_calendar_save_zoom_desc: Remembers your selected zoom (Ctrl + Scroll Wheel) between launches.
settings_sticker_emoji_desc: The symbol or Emoji (e.g., X, ‚ù§Ô∏è) placed upon clicking. Can be left EMPTY! then there will be no sticker at all
settings_sticker_scale_desc: Size multiplier (e.g., 1.0 = 100%, 1.5 = 150%). This parameter is highly buggy. Usage is not recommended.
settings_sticker_rotation_desc: The sticker will be rotated by a random angle from -N¬∞ to +N¬∞.
settings_calendar_marked_bg_desc: The background of the cell that has been marked.
settings_preview_sticker_desc: How the mark will look (left: max rotation, center: background, right: +max rotation).
settings_arrival_bg_color_desc: A special background color for the arrival day cell.
settings_preview_arrival_desc: How the arrival day cell will look.
settings_calendar_empty_bg_desc: The background for days that are outside the range (e.g., September 1-30).
settings_blur_strength_desc: How much the background is blurred on hover (in pixels). 0 = disable.
settings_desc_colors: Complete customization of the application's color scheme. Changes are displayed in the preview on the right.
settings_desc_danger: Actions in this zone cannot be undone.
settings_danger_reset_calendar_desc: Deletes all marks (X) from the calendar. The dates themselves are not affected.
settings_danger_reset_calendar_confirm: Are you sure you want to reset the calendar? This will delete all marks.
settings_danger_reset_all_desc: Returns the entire configuration to factory settings (including colors, dates, timers). A backup will be created.
settings_danger_reset_all_confirm:
!!! ARE YOU SURE YOU WANT TO RESET ALL SETTINGS? !!!
This action cannot be undone. You will delete EVEN THE TIMERS!
(A backup 'config.backup...json' will be created in the data folder)
